Stem: Woody, with large hooked spines to 30 mm. Flattened, green shoots form pseudo-leaves (cladodes) replacing true leaves.
Leaves: Reduced, scale-like, replaced by flattened shoots 30-90 x 3-7mm, slightly sickle-shaped.
Flowers: Several in a line, small, white, with six petal-like tepals.
FruitSeeds: Reddish, spherical berry 7-10 mm across, with 1-3 seeds.
DistinguishingFeatures: Pseudo-leaves large, to 90 x 7 mm, and large hooked spines.
